title: Main protective earthing conductor (MPEC)
fullText:
A protective earthing conductor, known as the main protective earthing conductor (MPEC), shall be installed between the earthing point, terminal or bar of the switchboard and â€”
(a) the earthing connection of the inlet plug, installed in accordance with Clause 2.4.4; and
(b) the supply lead connection, installed in accordance with Clause 2.4.3; and
(c) the conductive frame or chassis of the recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle.
The MPEC shall be insulated throughout its entire length.
